languages.text: "И здесь мы подходим к самому интересному моменту в нашей беседе. Вы знаете мой план, теперь я желаю знать ваш. Осознаете ли вы мою правоту и примкнете ко мне в этом безусловно дерзком свершении, или же вы попытаетесь мне помешать? Не буду врать — в последнем случае я вынужден буду вас ликвидировать. Впрочем, вы и так это понимаете".

"And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."
languages.original_text: "И здесь мы подходим к самому интересному моменту в нашей беседе. Вы знаете мой план, теперь я желаю знать ваш. Осознаете ли вы мою правоту и примкнете ко мне в этом безусловно дерзком свершении, или же вы попытаетесь мне помешать? Не буду врать — в последнем случае я вынужден буду вас ликвидировать. Впрочем, вы и так это понимаете".

traits.locale_text: "And here we come to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you understand that I am right and join me in this undeniably audacious undertaking, or will you try and stop me? I will be upfront about it — if it is the latter, then I will be forced to eliminate you. But you surely understand that already.

"And here we come to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you understand that I am right and join me in this undeniably audacious undertaking, or will you try and stop me? I will be upfront about it — if it is the latter, then I will be forced to eliminate you. But you surely understand that already.

"And here we come to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Do you understand that I am right and will you join me in this undeniably audacious act, or will you try and stop me? I'll be upfront about it: if it's the latter, I'll be forced to eliminate you. But you surely understand that already."

"And here we come to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Do you understand that I am right and will you join me in this undeniably audacious act, or will you try and stop me? I'll be upfront about it: if it's the latter, I'll be forced to eliminate you. But you surely understand that already."

"And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

"And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

languages.text: « Nous en arrivons à la partie la plus intéressante de notre conversation. Maintenant que vous connaissez mon plan, j'aimerais que vous me fassiez part du vôtre. Allez-vous admettre que j'ai raison et vous joindre à moi dans cette action indéniablement audacieuse, ou bien tenterez-vous de m'arrêter ? Je vais être direct : si vous vous dressez contre moi, je me verrai forcé de vous éliminer. Mais vous étiez sûrement déjà {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à cette conclusion. »
languages.original_text: "And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

traits.locale_text: « Nous en arrivons à la partie la plus intéressante de notre conversation. Maintenant que vous connaissez mon plan, j'aimerais que vous me fassiez part du vôtre. Comprenez-vous que j'ai raison et vous joindrez-vous à moi dans cette action indéniablement audacieuse, ou bien tenterez-vous de m'arrêter ? Je vais être direct : si vous vous dressez contre moi, je me verrai forcé de vous éliminer. Mais vous étiez sûrement déjà {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à cette conclusion. »

languages.text: «Y eso nos lleva a la parte más interesante de nuestra conversación. Ya conoce mi plan, de modo que también quiero conocer el suyo. ¿Admitirá que estoy en lo cierto y se unirá a mí en esta empresa tan ambiciosa o tratará de detenerme? Seré claro con usted: si es la segunda opción, no me quedará más remedio que eliminarl{mf|e|a}, pero imagino que ya lo suponía».
languages.original_text: "And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

traits.locale_text: «Y así llegamos a la parte más interesante de nuestra conversación. Ya conoce mi plan, de modo que yo quiero conocer también el suyo. ¿Entiende que tengo razón y me apoyará en esta empresa tan audaz o tratará de detenerme? Seré claro: si decide lo segundo, no me quedará más remedio que eliminarl{mf|o|a}, pero imagino que ya contaba con ello».

languages.text: “既然如此，轮到这场谈话最有趣的部分了。既然你已经知道了我的打算，那我也想知道你的打算。你愿意承认，我做的一切都是正确的吗？你愿意与我一起执行这个大胆的计划吗？还是说，你打算阻止我？我可以坦率地告诉你，如果你打算阻止我，我恐怕不得不消灭你。但我相信，你肯定早就意识到了。”
languages.original_text: "And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，轮到这场谈话最有趣的部分了。既然你已经知道了我的打算，那我也想知道你的打算。你能明白，我做的一切都是正确的吗？你愿意与我一起执行这个大胆的计划吗？还是说，你打算阻止我？我可以坦率地告诉你，如果你打算阻止我，我恐怕不得不消灭你，但你肯定早就明白了。”

languages.text: "Und das führt uns zum interessantesten Teil unserer Unterhaltung. Ihr kennt meinen Plan, nun möchte ich den Euren kennen. Gebt Ihr zu, dass ich recht habe, und werdet Ihr mich bei diesem offen wagemutigem Vorgehen unterstützen, oder werdet Ihr versuchen, mich aufzuhalten? Ich sage es ganz offen: Falls Letzteres, dann bin ich gezwungen, Euch zu beseitigen. Doch das wisst Ihr gewiss bereits."
languages.original_text: "And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

traits.locale_text: "Und nun kommen wir zum interessantesten Teil unserer Unterhaltung. Ihr kennt meinen Plan, nun möchte ich den Euren kennen. Ist Euch bewusst, dass ich recht habe, und werdet Ihr mich bei diesem offen wagemutigem Vorgehen unterstützen, oder werdet Ihr versuchen, mich aufzuhalten? Ich sage es ganz offen: Falls Letzteres, dann bin ich gezwungen, Euch zu eliminieren. Aber das ist Euch gewiss längst bewusst."

languages.text: 「そして、我々の会話で最も興味深い部分に移ろう。あなたは私の計画を知っているから、今度はあなたの計画を知りたい。私が正しいことを認め、この紛れもなく野心的な行為に加わるか、それとも私を止めようとするのか、どちらを選択する？率直に言うが、もし後者なら、私はあなたを排除せざるを得ない。だが、あなたは既にそれを理解しているはずだ」
languages.original_text: "And that brings us to the most interesting part of our conversation. You know my plan, so now I want to know yours. Will you admit that I am in the right and join me in this undeniably ambitious act, or will you try to stop me? I will be upfront with you: if it is the latter, I will be forced to remove you. But I am sure you realise that already."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、ここからが我々の会話で最も興味深い部分だ。あなたは私の計画を知っている。私が正しいことを理解し、この紛れもなく大胆な行為に加わるのか、それとも私を止めようとするのか。率直に言おう。もし後者なら、私はあなたを排除せざるを得ない。だが、あなたはすでにそれを理解しているはずだ」
